snippet.title: The Sims 3 Pets Xbox 360/PS3 Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch this trailer of The Sims 3 Pets (coming to Xbox360 and PS3 on October 18, 2011) to see how you can create perfect—or imperfect—pets for your Sims, from fierce guard dogs to destructive kittens as you determine their looks—and personality traits. Lead your Sims on adventures, like uncovering relics and solving mysteries. Treat your Sims to 10 exclusive, unique breeds, including tiger dogs and skunk cats found only in the Limited Edition. With a variety of new activities and social interactions, take control of your Sims' pets to discover surprising new ways to play with life! 
See if you can catch a few surprising we have in store for you in this trailer.
